message: The copy path button has been combined with the copy button. You now press [bright_cyan]keybinds.extra_copy.open_popup[/] (most likely `Y`) followed by [bright_cyan]keybinds.extra_copy.copy_single_path[/] (most likely `p`) to copy the path to your clipboard.
[bright_blue]plugins.editor.*[/] has been moved to [bright_cyan]settings.editor.*[/] with a restructured configuration.
The editor is no longer a plugin, but a core feature.
- [bright_blue]plugins.editor.file_executable[/] -> [bright_cyan]settings.editor.file.run[/]
- [bright_blue]plugins.editor.file_suspend[/] -> [bright_cyan]settings.editor.file.suspend[/]
- [bright_blue]plugins.editor.folder_executable[/] -> [bright_cyan]settings.editor.folder.run[/]
- [bright_blue]plugins.editor.folder_suspend[/] -> [bright_cyan]settings.editor.folder.suspend[/]
- [bright_blue]plugins.editor.open_all_in_editor[/] -> [bright_cyan]settings.editor.open_all_in_editor[/]
- [bright_blue]plugins.editor.keybinds[/] -> [bright_cyan]keybinds.open_editor[/]
Note: [bright_blue]plugins.editor.enabled[/] is removed; the editor is always available.
[bright_blue]modes[/] have been removed, use [bright_cyan]--config-folder[/] to load custom configurations instead.
Modes were experimental and are now deprecated/removed.

[bright_blue]settings.show_hidden_files[/], [bright_blue]settings.allow_tab_nav[/], [bright_blue]settings.append_new_tabs[/], [bright_blue]settings.double_click_delay[/], [bright_blue]settings.drive_watcher_frequency[/] and [bright_blue]settings.image_protocol[/] have been moved to [bright_cyan]interface.*[/] to be more consistent with what they do.
[bright_blue]plugins.file_one.mime_rules.*[/] has been renamed to [bright_cyan]interface.mime_rules.*[/] because file(1) is no longer a requirement to make use of mime types.

[bright_blue]interface.preview_binary[/], [bright_blue]interface.preview_text.binary[/], [bright_blue]interface.preview_text.empty[/] and [bright_blue]interface.preview_text.too_large[/] have been removed after being made useless by puremagic and file(1).
[bright_blue]plugins.finder.*[/] has been moved to [bright_cyan]plugins.fd.*[/] to keep it consistent with what it is interfacing with.
[bright_blue]keybinds.change_sort_order[/] has had a minor change.
It is now expanded to support changing keybinds for the different sort options.
A simple fix to this error is to rename [bright_blue]keybinds.change_sort_order[/] to [bright_cyan]keybinds.change_sort_order.open_popup[/].
[bright_blue]interface.preview_error[/] and [bright_blue]interface.preview_start[/] have been moved over to their own section.
The new location is now at [bright_blue]interface.preview_text[/], which can contain
- [bright_green]interface.preview_text.error[/] (for errors in rendering)
- [bright_green]interface.preview_text.start[/] (shown for a split second when starting up)
[bright_blue]settings.preview_full[/] has been removed for now.
- when previewing archives, the full contents of it are listed.
- when previewing files, with or without [bright_cyan]bat[/], the height will always be enough to fill the container.
[bright_blue]settings.cd_on_quit[/] has been removed in favour of using [bright_blue]--cwd-file[/]
Remove it from your [cyan]config.toml[/] and update your shell configuration with the functions from the [u][link=https://nspc911.github.io/rovr/features/cd-on-quit/#shell-configuration]docs[/][/]
Cannot click on the link? https://nspc911.github.io/rovr/features/cd-on-quit/#shell-configuration
[bright_blue]interface.compact_mode[/] has been expanded into two extra options
- [bright_cyan]interface.compact_mode.buttons[/] makes the header buttons smaller (you can toggle the header with the default key of `M`)
- [bright_cyan]interface.compact_mode.panels[/] makes the panels smaller so that there is more space for the actual file list.
